news.title: Margarine vs butter: how what we spread on our toast became a weapon of class war
news.summary: Margarine has seen its fortunes ebb and flow with the tide of popular opinion. But Unilever’s recent announcement that it’s dropping the margarine brands Flora and Stork marks a new low point for the spread.
